t: FireStick Remote Not Working? I Fixed It (Update: May 2025)
s: May 1, 2025 - Purchase good-quality AAA alkaline batteries from brands like Energizer, Duracell, and Camelion. Before inserting new batteries in your FireStick remote, check that the battery connectors are not rusty. If they are, you can clean them with isopropyl alcohol.
